pageContext.claim: “When [Randi the radio guy who Stone supposedly intimidated] heard that Roger was going to prison, he said, 'What are you talking about? I didn't know you're sending him to pri --' He didn't know what the hell they were doing.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump misstates Randy Credico’s ask for the judge to show Stone mercy. Credico told the New York Times “I don't want to see a guy go to prison because of me. It’s going to be on my conscience, plus it’s going to anger a lot of people out there who called me a rat.” Moreover, Credico has a lifelong hatred of incarceration as a result of how it changed his father. He told the Times, “I would ask for leniency for Hannibal Lecter.” In other words, his plea had more to do with himself than Stone.
